snippet: Metropolitan Diary: A resident of Second Avenue in the 80s wants to know why a Northern mockingbird serenades the singles crowd nightly, and if he’s part of it.
abstract: Metropolitan Diary: A resident of Second Avenue in the 80s wants to know why a Northern mockingbird serenades the singles crowd nightly, and if he’s part of it.

headline.main: Mockingbird Interrupts Second Avenue Bar Scene
